text: Costa Rica competed at the 1988 Winter Olympics in Calgary, Canada. ==Alpine skiing== ;Men {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !Race 1 !Race 2 !colspan="2"|Total |- !Time !Time !Time !Rank |- |Julián Muñoz |rowspan="2"|Giant Slalom |align="center"|1:38.71 |align="center"|1:41.88 |align="center"|3:20.59 |align="center"|68 |- |Arturo Kinch |align="center"|1:26.71 |align="center"|1:23.12 |align="center"|2:49.83 |align="center"|62 |- |Julián Muñoz |Slalom |align="center"|1:30.10 |align="center"|1:26.62 |align="center"|2:56.72 |align="center"|51 |} == Cross-country skiing== ;Men {|class="wikitable" border="1" style="font-size:90%" |- !rowspan=2|Event !rowspan=2|Athlete !colspan=2|Race |- !Time !Rank |- |15 km C |Arturo Kinch |align=center|59:37.9 |align=center|82 |- |30 km C |Arturo Kinch |align=center|2'16:20.2 |align=center|87 |} C = Classical style, F = Freestyle ==References== *Official Olympic Reports * Olympic Winter Games 1988, full results by sports-reference.com Category:Nations at the 1988 Winter Olympics 1988 Winter Olympics
